name: Hyperturbo Great Emu War 1932
description:
Race through the desert in Hyperturbo Great Emu War 1932 as the fastest and deadliest animal of all - the emu! As featured on Kotaku!

Created as an entry for the Awful Winter Jam 2018 for the theme "Weird History" and winner of the "Most Fun" category

Controls 
-  A  /Left Arrow -  Turn Left
-  D / Right Arrow-  Turn Right
-  S / Down Arrow - Brake
-  Space - Dash into enemies

Tips
-  It's easier to turn when you move slower - brake with S or Down Arrow
- Soldiers will only start shooting if you've been in their line of sight
- Emus are incredibly scary, and soldiers will miss their shots if you are directly in front of them
- Moving in circles will confuse soldiers, making you harder to shoot

Options
- F8 and F9 - Adjust screen size (windowed mode)
- F11 - Enable & disable fullscreen

Completion stats
- Jam Length - 16 days (6 Jan - 21 Jan 2018)
Development Length - ~10 days

SFX Content packs used - All SFX have been composited from or modified from their original sources;

  • Soniss GDC Game Audio Bundle #1, alternative link here
  • Soniss GDC Game Audio Bundle #2
  • Soniss GDC Game Audio Bundle #3
  • Universal Sound FX

Music created in Logic Pro.
